description: Talent Passport & Long Stay Work Visa. Note: New salary thresholds effective Aug 2025.

meta.min_funds_requirement:
**Talent Passport Thresholds (2025):**
* **Qualified Employee:** 39,582 EUR/year
* **EU Blue Card:** 59,373 EUR/year

add.title: Employment Contract
add.description: CERFA form signed by employer + Contract stating salary meets the threshold (e.g., >39,582 EUR).

steps_flow.title: Employer Application
steps_flow.description: Your employer in France applies for work authorization via the 'Administration Numérique pour les Étrangers en France' (ANEF).

steps_flow.title: France-Visas Application
steps_flow.description: Complete the application on France-Visas portal once authorization is received.

steps_flow.title: VFS Appointment
steps_flow.description: Submit documents and biometrics at VFS Global.
